name: k6-multi-load-tests
description: Project of load tests with K6

scripts.k6Node1: npm run fakeUserLogin & npm run fakeProductToCart
scripts.fakeProductToCart: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/fakestore/fakestore_product_to_cart.js $OUTPUT
scripts.fakeAddNewUser: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/fakestore/fakestore_new_user.js $OUTPUT
scripts.fakeUserLogin: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/fakestore/fakestore_user_login.js $OUTPUT
